fields.title: Format Version
fields.description: Version of the JSON schema for this file. Aim-assist categories requires at least version 1.21.50.

fields.title: Minecraft Aim Assist Categories
fields.description: A single Camera Aim-Assist Categories Definition.

fields.title: Categories
fields.description: List of categories used by Camera Aim-Assist 'minecraft:aim_assist_preset'.

fields.title: Name
fields.description: Name of the Aim-Assist Category used during lookup.

fields.title: Priorities
fields.description: The set of priorities used when determining aim-assist selection.

fields.title: Block Default
fields.description: Optional. Default Aim-Assist targeting priority used for Blocks not found in 'blocks'.

fields.title: Blocks
fields.description: Optional. Map of Block identifiers to Aim-Assist targeting priority. Larger numbers have greater priority.

fields.title: Entities
fields.description: Optional. Map of Entity identifiers to Aim-Assist targeting priority. Larger numbers have greater priority.

fields.title: Entity Default
fields.description: Optional. Default Aim-Assist targeting priority used for Entities not found in 'entities'.
